医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
科学家发现射血分数保留的心力衰竭的潜在新疗法杜克大学-新加坡国立大学科学家及其合作者发现了一种治疗射血分数保留性心力衰竭（HFpEF）的潜在新疗法，这是一种众所周知难以治疗的心脏病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Scientists-discover-pottial-new-treatment-for-heart-failure-with-preserved-ejection-fraction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Scientists-discover-pottial-new-treatment-for-heart-failure-with-preserved-ejection-fraction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1cf262f4-bd66-442f-9f47-8585e238cc93 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 08:34:29 -0400 Scientists discover potential new treatment for heart failure with preserved ejection fraction
研究表明 COVID-19 会增加急性肾病的风险四川大学华西医院的研究人员进行的一项研究表明，COVID-19 与急性肾病 (AKD)（包括急性肾损伤 (AKI)）之间存在显着关联，且这种关联会随时间而变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Study-links-COVID-19-to-increased-risk-of-acute-kidney-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Study-links-COVID-19-to-increased-risk-of-acute-kidney-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=74e0ef71-6e66-4056-9fa5-b9232b4b630d Mon, 30 Sep 2024 07:28:56 -0400 Study links COVID-19 to increased risk of acute kidney disorders
创新的机器学习技术改变了 MRI 成像效率使用经过智能训练的神经网络，格拉茨工业大学的研究人员成功地从一些 MRI 测量数据中生成了跳动心脏的精确实时图像。其他 MRI 应用也可以使用此过程来加速。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Innovative-machine-learning-technique-transforms-MRI-imaging-efficiency.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Innovative-machine-learning-technique-transforms-MRI-imaging-efficiency.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fba7909-b374-4e9b-a8de-01e684f1cb47 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 07:13:00 -0400 Innovative machine learning technique transforms MRI imaging efficiency
AAP 发布首份儿科护理中阿片类药物使用临床指南美国儿科学会发布了第一份儿科阿片类药物处方临床指南，包括如何以及何时开这些药物治疗疼痛的明确说明，同时降低长期成瘾风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/AAP-publishes-first-clinical-guideline-for-opioid-use-in-pediatric-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/AAP-publishes-first-clinical-guideline-for-opioid-use-in-pediatric-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a68c4ba1-71f6-4c30-8360-d9a19aaae7f0 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 06:58:43 -0400 AAP publishes first clinical guideline for opioid use in pediatric care
革命性的手持式扫描仪增强了早期疾病诊断的 3D 成像伦敦大学学院研究人员开发的新型手持式扫描仪可以在短短几秒钟内生成高度详细的 3D 光声图像，为首次在临床环境中使用铺平了道路，并为早期疾病诊断提供了潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Revolutionary-hand-held-scanner-enhances-3D-imaging-for-early-disease-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Revolutionary-hand-held-scanner-enhances-3D-imaging-for-early-disease-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b33f1a6-c77f-40c3-99e9-9768b241da12 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 06:47:47 -0400 Revolutionary hand-held scanner enhances 3D imaging for early disease diagnosis
医疗保险优势影响力机器联邦官员十多年前就决心打击政府对私人医疗保险优势医疗保险计划的巨额超额支付，这些计划每年吸走数十亿美元的税款。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/The-Medicare-Advantage-influence-machine.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/The-Medicare-Advantage-influence-machine.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3bc6fe0-4f0a-436b-bfd7-954ff2b032f5 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 06:38:15 -0400 The Medicare Advantage influence machine
加州选民认为对惯犯的严厉关爱加州选民正在考虑是否撤销十年前颁布的部分刑事司法改革，因为对大规模监禁的担忧让位于公众对财产犯罪和自 covid-19 大流行爆发以来一直困扰该州的芬太尼危机的愤怒。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/California-voters-consider-tough-love-for-repeat-drug-offenders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/California-voters-consider-tough-love-for-repeat-drug-offenders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=803de87d-f3a2-476c-92dd-6353226d3b34 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 06:34:51 -0400 California voters consider tough love for repeat drug offenders
自身免疫性疾病在 40 岁之前停止排卵的女性中更为常见该研究发现卵巢早衰与自身免疫性疾病之间存在显着相关性，敦促进一步研究预防方法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Autoimmune-diseases-more-common-in-women-who-stop-ovulated-before-40.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Autoimmune-diseases-more-common-in-women-who-stop-ovulate-before-40.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc5fb4e5-ad98-41e9-8361-ad422cfa1015 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 06:34:00 -0400 Autoimmune diseases more common in women who stop ovulating before 40
八氢番茄红素可延长寿命，减少氧化应激和淀粉样蛋白毒性研究表明，微藻中的八氢番茄红素可防止氧化应激和β-淀粉样蛋白毒性，这表明其在促进健康衰老方面的潜力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Phytoene-increases-lifespan-reduces-氧化-应激-和-淀粉样蛋白-毒性.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Phytoene-increases-lifespan-reduces-氧化-应激-and-淀粉样蛋白-毒性.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae3224af-3e6b-43d2-a6ab-aea21e52cb6f Mon, 30 Sep 2024 06:23:00 -0400 Phytoene increases lifespan, reduces oxidative stress and amyloid toxicity
超过 80% 的女性在妊娠晚期缺铁孕妇普遍缺铁，影响健康结果。这项研究强调了怀孕期间监测和营养的重要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Over-8025-of-women-are-iron-deficient-by-their-third-trimester.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240930/Over-8025-of-women-are-iron-deficient-by-their-third-trimester.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80fbbea3-736e-4e9a-9152-7dd124eacbc7 Mon, 30 Sep 2024 05:55:00 -0400 Over 80% of women are iron deficient by their third trimester
